pullrequest.title: Fix for adding links after a model has been constructed

content.raw:
The only time we should need to refresh like this is when a new collision geometry is added. This is a [known issue](https://github.com/dartsim/dart/issues/368) in dartsim. Sorry that I forgot about this when you were initially debugging the issue!

I think ultimately this is a problem that should be fixed within dartsim, but in the meantime this kind of workaround is reasonable.
